item.title: azur
item.description: l’amore gray gray black gray white gray gray black white gray white black your heart, italian marble. / (positano 2021) tourguide their fear fell burning, a sun poured over them. the brothel’s ruins, the ruins of dogs, of people. burnt into time, into shadows as sights for the future visitors. our dreams fell burning, dichotomies poured over us. the ruins of love, of trust. burnt into hearts, into minds as sights for the future lovers.
